channel.title: Rep++ :D
channel.description: i'm having some issues with my highscores but WAIT, we already have the button up and also the site sided. BUT i'm needing help SERVER sided, because i have one extra skill and nothing is showing up on the site. I'm thinking i'm needing to 1+ the skill array to add the skill (pking skill) but not too sure how to do so. (ps): i have mysql set up and working properly, i'm currently getting NO errors server or website sided but just not updating website sided, any help i will rep+
